amendment.description: To modify the reporting requirements of the Secretary of Commerce relative to the impact of offsets on domestic contractors and lower tier subcontractors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2209 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S15480-15481; text: CR S15481) To modify the reporting requirements of the Secretary of Commerce relative to the impact of offsets on domestic contractors and lower tier subcontractors.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2209 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
